description: In an exclusiver feature filmed just for BpyzParty.com, the attraction has been simmering between brunette stunners Aaron Mitchell and Carmine DeMarco since they first met.  Today is ther magic day when friends become lovers in an all out, no holes barred, fuck and suck fest that will leave you as breatheless as it left them!
title: BP Exclusive 'Friends & Lovers', Scene #01
